short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Space Galaxy Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Space Galaxy background. Galaxy wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features of the Extension:

1. Every new tab greets you with a shuffled Space Galaxy wallpaper.
2. Choose or mark as favorite from a variety of Space Galaxy backgrounds in the selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create a new note to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your frequently visited sites.
8. Straightforward access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel inclusion for rapid website access.
10. Immediate entry to Google applications.
11. Swift navigation to additional themes.
12. Share easily across social media platforms.
13. Instant download of wallpapers.
14. Direct links to online gaming.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Space Galaxy tab.
